text: Zalman Shoval (, born 28 April 1930) is an Israeli politician and diplomat. He is also active in Israel's economic life. He was the Israeli ambassador to the United States in the years 1990–1993 and 1998–2000, and an active member of the Knesset in the Rafi party of Ben Gurion, the State List, and the Likud party. Shoval was born in the Free City of Danzig (now Gdańsk, Poland). ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Knesset Category:German Jews Category:Likud politicians Category:Ambassadors of Israel Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:People from former German territories Category:Politicians from Gdańsk
title: Zalman Shoval
